meanings.definition: A pungent Italian pasta sauce typically made with tomatoes, olives, capers, anchovies, and garlic.
meanings.sent1: I made a delicious puttanesca sauce for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a flavorful puttanesca pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: The puttanesca sauce was so tasty, it made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering puttanesca filled the kitchen with a Mediterranean essence.
meanings.sent5: The puttanesca sauce had a bold and zesty flavor that lingered on the palate.
